headline: AZ Senate Hopeful's Ad Shows Him Shooting Biden, Pelosi, And Mark Kelly For LULZ
author: Liz Dye
sentences: And just yesterday Senator Mike Lee of Utah responded to criticism of Republicans' disgusting treatment of non-white Biden nominees as “the very sort of comment that would incite people to anger, acts of retaliation and violence.” As if the Red Team's incendiary rhetoric hadn't incited an actual insurrection a year ago!

But who knows, maybe Lamon will get his turn in the spotlight yet, since he was one of the cosplay electors that put his name on the fake electoral college certificate that Arizona Republicans tried to pass off to the National Archives as the real deal.

He's facing off against multiple candidates, including the sitting Attorney General Mark Brnovich, who got crosswise with Trump for failing to overturn the election, and Peter Thiel's sock puppet candidate Blake Masters.

“Unlike Kelly, Jim Lamon will shoot straight with Arizonans and take the fight to Biden — and he damn sure won’t let the left bully him into backing down,” Lamon's campaign spokesman told the Arizona Republic.
This isn't the first time Lamon, a solar company executive, has run an incendiary ad in an attempt to boost his name recognition and perhaps even win the coveted Trump nod.
Here's US Senate candidate Jim Lamon, running to represent Arizona, pretending to shoot President Joe Biden, Speaker Nancy Pelosi, and Senator Mark Kelly in a campaign ad.
Yeah, Mark Kelly's wife Gabby Giffords was actually shot in the head in 2011 during an attack in Tucson that killed six people, including a 9-year-old girl.
See it's funny because shooting elected officials is good clean fun — just as long as the shooter is a Republican and the officials are Democrats.
Lamon is clearly looking to get attention in a crowded Republican primary, and intends to run this ad during the Super Bowl this coming weekend.
Last month he got a lot of mileage out of a "Let's Go Brandon" ad that was rejected by Yahoo for being "overly inflammatory and offensive."
But anonymously, since he didn't want to attach his name to this shit if yet another deranged MAGA loon takes this stuff seriously.
Remember when Kathy Griffin help up a Trump mask covered in ketchup and wound up with the Secret Service at her front door?
Anyway, Kathy Griffin's career never recovered, but cancel culture is bad and Democrats are the real bullies.
It's just a guy running for elected office saying, "The good people of Arizona have had enough of you.
It's time for a showdown," and then firing a gun at the president and the speaker of the House?
The woman is still getting death threats, but the rules are different for Republicans.
Republicans fainted when Rep. Rashida Tlaib called to "Impeach the motherfucker."
And he only shoots the guns out of their hands, so it's not even violent.
And if you're ordering from Amazon, use this link, because reasons.
They're very upset that Biden made cusses about Peter Doocy.
Click the widget to keep your Wonkette ad-free and feisty.
(And still can't clinch the Trump endorsement, LOL.)
As for Lamon, he's very proud of himself.
How often would you like to donate?
Jeez, can't you take a joke?
But don't be so touchy!
Pew pew shooty shooty!
Mostly.
